description.value:
Your pigmentation is oddly colorless, and your eyes are highly sensitive to light. You are blinded for 1 round when exposed to normal or bright light and dazzled while in such a lit area. You gain darkvision to a range of 30 feet.

At 5th level, the range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.

At 10th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Shadow Conjuration} to your list of 4th-level oracle spells known and @Compendium[pf1.spells.2q48ogrz3840xwi7]{Shadow Evocation} to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known.

At 15th level, add @Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Shadow Walk} to your list of 6th-level oracle spells known.
